name: Furry Feet 2
description:
The game

Welcome to Furry Feet2, the long awaited sequel to our challenging puzzle game, each level comes with an increase in difficulty. 3 Unique exclusive and exciting puzzle formulas await you.

Features

- Enjoy 12 levels challenging levels.

- Play through our 3 distinct puzzle formulas.

- Completing levels unlock new gallery art, revealing its artwork.
